title: banban007s4
author: banban007s4
content: If anyone is looking for miners, there you can buy it from Canaan's only official online store, shipping within 7 days after payment, available worldwide and in remote locations. Official telegram contact @canaanofficial, more models are coming soon

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: banban007s4 on May 31, 2022, 09:08:55 AMOfficial telegram contact @canaanofficial, more models are coming soonI don't see anywhere on their website (https://canaan.io/) them mentioning their own Telegram group and since Telegram is known by scams I would advise everyone not to try do the business that way and instead contact them via social media stated on their website.
